explains: n. 浪漫主义；浪漫精神

sentences.en: Her determined romanticism was worrying me.
sentences.cn: 她坚定的浪漫主义正让我担心着呢。

sentences.en: Jane Austen's relationship to Romanticism has long been a vexed one.
sentences.cn: 简·奥斯丁与浪漫主义的关系一直是一个棘手的问题。

sentences.en: The strongest themes are romanticism and a reverence for nature.
sentences.cn: 其最大的主题就是浪漫精神和对自然的敬畏。
